The advanced capabilities that were available in the on-premises world are unlikely to be as robust in the cloud product. This strategy mirrors that of products like Microsoft or NetSuite, where the focus is on leveraging partners to deliver industry-specific functionalities. This approach can strengthen distribution by encouraging partners to invest more deeply in the product and its ecosystem." Watch the full episode: https://lnkd.in/g2NN6Pft #ERP #cloud #WBSRocks

ğŸ“£ Businesses are switching from NetSuite to Acumatica for better value, flexibility, and performance. Here are just a few reasons why: ğŸ‘‰ Acumatica is more affordable than NetSuite. It offers a variety of pricing options to fit the needs of businesses of all sizes. ğŸ‘‰ Acumatica is more flexible than NetSuite. It offers a wider range of deployment options, including on-premises, cloud, and hybrid. ğŸ‘‰ Acumatica is more performant than NetSuite. It can handle more transactions and users with fewer resources. If you're looking for an ERP system that will give you the best value, flexibility, and performance, Acumatica is the better choice. Download our complimentary infographic to learn more about why businesses are switching from NetSuite to Acumatica: https://lnkd.in/eSjE_MA6 . . . . #netsuite #acumatica #clouderp #erpsolutions #catechnology
